revised_title: Evolution of a Quasi-Steady Critical Layer in a Stratified Viscous Shear Layer
tldr: This study examines the evolution of a quasi-steady critical layer in a stratified viscous shear layer, focusing on the nonlinear development of the disturbance and the effects of viscosity. The research explores the interaction between the critical layer and the mean flow, providing insights into the behavior of fluids in unstable conditions.
